attributes.action: Do Not Allow Flour Fortification with Folic Acid in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Folic acid is a synthetic form of vitamin B9 which not every individual can process and has been linked to increased cancer risk, tumour promotion in existing cancers & interference with antifolate chemotherapy drugs.  Colon cancer rates in the USA and Chile have increased since starting fortification.

A fully-referenced argument: http://www.principalnutrition.co.uk/flour-fortification-in-the-uk/

We call on the UK Govt to allow people to choose for themselves if they wish to ingest folic acid.
attributes.background: In early 2019 the government will be consulting on mandatory flour fortification with folic acid in the UK to prevent foetal abnormalities.
